name: Fastener Beam Interface
description: defines the interface between a fastener and a beam.

inputParameters.name: Outline
inputParameters.description: Referenced curve or polyline, Guid of curve or polyline in the active Rhino document. Defines the polyline outline of the plate fastener.

inputParameters.name: Thickness
inputParameters.description: Float defining the thickness of the plate fastener.

inputParameters.name: Drill Points
inputParameters.description: points defining the center of the holes in the plate fastener and the drill holes in the beam.

inputParameters.name: Drill Diameters
inputParameters.description: Float defining the diameter of the drill holes.

inputParameters.name: Shapes
inputParameters.description: Breps defining shapes to boolean union with the plate to define the fastener shape.

inputParameters.name: Features
inputParameters.description: Features defining operation to be applied to the beam.

outputParameters.name: Interface
outputParameters.description: FastenerBeamInterface definition used in a fastener element.
